verses.verse: Then answered <WH6030> Bildad <WH1085> the Shuhite <WH7747>, and said <WH559>,
How long <WH5704> will it be before you make <WH7760> an end <WH7078> of words <WH4405>? mark <WH995>, and afterwards <WH310> we will speak <WH1696>.
Therefore are we counted <WH2803> as animals <WH929>, and reputed vile <WH2933> in your sight <WH5869>?
He tears <WH2963> himself <WH5315> in his anger <WH639>: shall the earth <WH776> be forsaken <WH5800> for you <WH6697>? and shall the rock be removed <WH6275> out of his place <WH4725>?
Yes <WH216>, the window of the wicked <WH7563> shall be put out <WH1846>, and the spark <WH7632> of his fire <WH784> shall not shine <WH5050>.
The window <WH216> shall be dark <WH2821> in his tabernacle <WH168>, and his candle <WH5216> shall be put out with him <WH1846>.
The steps <WH6806> of his strength <WH202> shall be distressed <WH3334>, and his own counsel <WH6098> shall cast him down <WH7993>.
For he is cast <WH7971> into a net <WH7568> by his own feet <WH7272>, and he walks <WH1980> upon a snare <WH7639>.
The gin <WH6341> shall take <WH270> him by the heel <WH6119>, and the robber <WH6782> shall prevail against him <WH2388>.
The snare <WH2256> is laid <WH2934> for him in the ground <WH776>, and a trap <WH4434> for him in the way <WH5410>.
Terrors <WH1091> shall make him afraid <WH1204> on every side <WH5439>, and shall drive <WH6327> him to his feet <WH7272>.
His strength <WH202> shall be hungerbitten <WH7457>, and destruction <WH343> shall be ready <WH3559> at his side <WH6763>.
It shall devour <WH398> the strength <WH905> of his skin <WH5785>: even the firstborn <WH1060> of death <WH4194> shall devour <WH398> his strength <WH905>.
His confidence <WH4009> shall be rooted out <WH5423> of his tabernacle <WH168>, and it shall bring <WH6805> him to the king <WH4428> of terrors <WH1091>.
It shall live <WH7931> in his tabernacle <WH168>, because it is none <WH1097> of his <WH1614>: brimstone shall be scattered <WH2219> upon his habitation <WH5116>.
His roots <WH8328> shall be dried up <WH3001> beneath <WH4605>, and above shall his branch <WH7105> be cut off <WH5243>.
His memory <WH2143> shall perish <WH6> from the earth <WH776>, and he shall have no name <WH8034> in the street <WH6440>.
He shall be driven <WH1920> from window <WH216> into darkness <WH2822>, and chased <WH5074> out of the world <WH8398>.
He shall neither have son <WH5209> nor nephew <WH5220> among his people <WH5971>, nor any remaining <WH8300> in his dwellings <WH4033>.
They that come after <WH314> him shall be astonished <WH8074> at his day <WH3117>, as they that went before <WH6931> were afraid <WH270>.
Surely such are the dwellings <WH4908> of the wicked <WH5767>, and this is the place <WH4725> of him that knows <WH3045> not God <WH410>.
